title: Line2 - Second Phone Number
summary: Add a 2nd line to your phone, tablet, or computer. Talk, message, and much more.
developerAddress: 535 Mission St. Suite 1926, San Francisco, CA 94105
description: Line2 is your second number that works on your Android phone, tablets, laptops and watches as a full-featured business phone system, designed for mobile professionals, freelancers, and entrepreneurs. Call and message from a separate number on devices you and your team already have, via Wi-Fi or your existing cellular network, with anyone in the U.S. and Canada for only $9.99/month, or with other Line2 users for free.Line2 is free to download and to use to call and message other Line2 users. Invite others to download Line2 today so you can communicate with them at no additional cost and without any ads. To call and message users outside of Line2, simply upgrade with an in-app purchase.Experience the ideal phone system for you and your business with a designated number in the area code of your choice. Keep business and personal separate without needing to purchase clunky landline phones or bulky hardware.POWERFUL FEATURES FOR JUST $9.99/MONTH:• Use your Line2 number across your smartphone, computers, tablets, and even smartwatches. • Choose a number in any city in the U.S. or Canada. • Enjoy picture and group messaging with anyone in the U.S. and Canada.• Get a rich and virtually unlimited calling experience that includes caller ID for incoming calls, call forwarding, group calling with up to 20 people, number blocking, and much more. • Enjoy quick and easy setup with no additional hardware required. • Use over Wi-Fi/3G/4G/LTE and cellular voice so you’re never without service. Looking for a business solution for your small business that grows with your company and offers advanced features like an auto attendant, toll-free numbers, online faxing, and much more? Learn more on our website. Questions or comments? We’re here to help, seven days a week: Support or tap Settings → Help from within the app.Consider Line2 if you’ve looked at: RingCentral, Sideline, 8x8, Google Voice, Skype
descriptionHTML:
Line2 is your second number that works on your Android phone, tablets, laptops and watches as a full-featured business phone system, designed for mobile professionals, freelancers, and entrepreneurs. Call and message from a separate number on devices you and your team already have, via Wi-Fi or your existing cellular network, with anyone in the U.S. and Canada for only $9.99/month, or with other Line2 users for free.


Line2 is free to download and to use to call and message other Line2 users. Invite others to download Line2 today so you can communicate with them at no additional cost and without any ads. To call and message users outside of Line2, simply upgrade with an in-app purchase.

Experience the ideal phone system for you and your business with a designated number in the area code of your choice. Keep business and personal separate without needing to purchase clunky landline phones or bulky hardware.

POWERFUL FEATURES FOR JUST $9.99/MONTH:
• Use your Line2 number across your smartphone, computers, tablets, and even smartwatches.
• Choose a number in any city in the U.S. or Canada.
• Enjoy picture and group messaging with anyone in the U.S. and Canada.
• Get a rich and virtually unlimited calling experience that includes caller ID for incoming calls, call forwarding, group calling with up to 20 people, number blocking, and much more.
• Enjoy quick and easy setup with no additional hardware required.
• Use over Wi-Fi/3G/4G/LTE and cellular voice so you’re never without service.

Looking for a business solution for your small business that grows with your company and offers advanced features like an auto attendant, toll-free numbers, online faxing, and much more? Learn more on our website.

Questions or comments? We’re here to help, seven days a week: Support or tap Settings → Help from within the app.

Consider Line2 if you’ve looked at: RingCentral, Sideline, 8x8, Google Voice, Skype
comments: Initially gave it a 1 star rating as the app was crashing. The support team guided me how to fix the issue and it is working once again. You need to clear your cache, make sure you turn off your automatic backup and restore on the app and then un install and re-install again. That took care of my issue.

I hated it. It frustrates me very much. It is telling me I have a line2 account but I know I very much don't. I hate this app with a passion gave it 1 star. Hated it bye might come back if y'all can fix my account

Love, love my line 2. Have had it for years! Beat deal out there! Try their fax service, beat ever. You can have any phone u have accept line 2 calls. With one phone u have an additional phone line  with line 2.  Line 2 had its own messaging. I have a personal line and a business line on one phone! Great, responsive costumer service!

I've written a review back in 2015 and I'll update it now. This app (and the desktops) are worlds behind any other platform. Messages disappear, app freezes, just a clusterfuck all around. Voice quality on WiFi is good, bad on 3g.
Could not open the app since a update Tried everything - restart, clear memory, reinstall, etc. Spent a lot of time & finally back to normal. Need more testing before updates.
It's OK but it doesn't record calls like the windows app and some of the stuff have to be done thru the computer in order to work in the app. Will continue to test app and update later.
recentChanges: Addressed updating issue affecting some users at app launch.
